text: A few heartwarming letters about the Cures Act Obama is signing today <https://www.whitehouse.gov/blog/2016/12/12/3-letters-explain-why-president-obama-signing-cures-act?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email659-text1&utm_campaign=cures>

attachments.title: 3 Letters That Explain Why President Obama Is Signing the Cures Act
attachments.text: Today, President Obama will sign the Cures Act into law. These letters from Americans across the country explain why.
attachments.fallback: whitehouse.gov: 3 Letters That Explain Why President Obama Is Signing the Cures Act
